recipes.label: Send a Package back into the Network
recipes.startdescription: If I cannot fulfill a delivery, or wish to unburden myself from it, and send it of with another raconteur.
recipes.description: After the verbal posturing that is so typical in a meeting between two raconteurs, I pass on the package and the clue, for my troubles I am left with a small sum. A triffle compared to what I could have gotten completing the delivery.
